name: example.com
description: Serve an SPA with node_modules and zero config as a service

scripts.start: nodemon -e mjs,js,html --watch src/backend/src --watch src/common/src --watch src/web/src --exec 'npm run transform && npm run dev'
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-backend && npm run build-common && npm run build-web
scripts.build-backend: cd src/backend && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build-common: cd src/common && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build-web: cd src/web && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle-backend && npm run bundle-common && npm run bundle-web
scripts.bundle-backend: cp -r src/backend build/backend && rm -rf build/backend/src && mv build/backend/build build/backend/src
scripts.bundle-common: cp -r src/common build/common && rm -rf build/common/src && mv build/common/build build/common/src
scripts.bundle-web: cp -r src/web build/web && rm -rf build/web/src && mv build/web/build build/web/src
scripts.transform: npm run bundle && npm run transform-backend && npm run transform-common && npm run transform-web
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-backend && npm run install-common && npm run install-web
scripts.readme: git add . && git commit -m 'readme' && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
